name: GonorrheaTestsForNeisseriaGonorrhoeaeNucleicAcid
title: Gonorrhea (Tests for Neisseria gonorrhoeae Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Neisseria gonorrhoeae nucleic acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Neisseria gonorrhoeae nucleic acid),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests;
LOINC system = ^donors;)
